{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated \$1.3M in 2019-2020 on contracts with TAURUS CONTRACTORS.
{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}
- [Taurus Contractors Ltd.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22Taurus%20Contractors%20Ltd.%22)
- [TAURUS CONTRACTORS LTD.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22TAURUS%20CONTRACTORS%20LTD.%22)
- [Taurus Contractors Ltd](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22Taurus%20Contractors%20Ltd%22)
{{< /details >}}
